title: Screen savers(Mac)
body: So for the league displays I downloaded it on my MacBook Pro. The wallpapers work fine but when I put a screensaver on the screen go grey and black like when u don't have signal on a t.v. Is there a way to solve this or is it just me?

replies.body: I'd probably use the bug report feature in the bottom right-hand corner of the display app to try and make sure someone notices this weirdness! It doesn't seem like we have any official troubleshooting lined up quite yet, but I do know they're watching reports for anything they can catch quickly and push out a fix for.
